title: FR: Enable checkpoint-sync-url and initial-state=genesis.ssz defined in the same process
body:

### Description
[Detailed description of the problem and the impact it has]

It would be great to have an additional flag created for checkpoint syncing, instead of reusing the --initial-state flag that is used for bootstrapping a custom network. 

When I want to enable checkpoint sync for a teku node, I always have to make sure that the original init-state flag is removed. 

It would be great to be able to define both: 

```sh
--initial-state=genesis.ssz
--checkpoint-sync-url=https://checkpoint-sync-endpoint
```

Where it would use the initial state only if there is no checkpoint sync endpoint is defined, or if checkpoint sync endpoint flag is not present.
